column1: "Good riddance to decisions that don't support self-care, self-value, and self-worth." - Oprah Winfrey
column2: "We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope." - Martin Luther King Jr.
column3: "Embrace the glorious mess that you are." - Elizabeth Gilbert
column4: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." - Joseph Campbell
column5:
"The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe."
- Bob Ross
column6:
"This is your world
You're the creator
Find freedom on this canvas
Believe, that you can do it,
‘Cuz you can do it.
You can do it."
- Bob Ross
column7: "The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it." - Nicholas Sparks
column8: "You have to allow the paint to break to make it beautiful." - Bob Ross
column9: "You need the dark in order to show the light." - Bob Ross
column10: I am doing my best and that is always enough.
column11: "As long as you are learning, you are not failing." - Bob Ross
column12: It wasn't raining when Noah built the ark." - Howard Ruff
column13: "Failure is an important part of your growth and developing resilience. Don't be afraid to fail" - Michelle Obama
column14: "Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn." - John Maxwell
column15: "I have stood on a mountain of no's for one yes." - B. Smith
column16: "Done is better than perfect." - Sheryl Sandberg
column17: "Everyone shines, given the right lighting." - Susan Cain
column18: I trust that I am on the right path.
column19: I am in charge of how I feel and today I am choosing happiness.
column21: I use my failures as a stepping stone.
column22: I am allowed to take up space.
column23: I'm doing my best and that is enough.

column1: "Am I good enough? Yes I am." - Michelle Obama
column2: "I'm giving you permission to root for yourself and while you're at it root for those around you, too." - Mindy Kaling
column3: "Nothing can dim the light that shines from within." - Maya Angelou
column4:
"We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents."
- Bob Ross
column5: "You must do the things you think you cannot do." - Eleanor Roosevelt
column6: "Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right." - Marian Wright Edelman
column7: "Everything passes if you learn to hold things lightly." - Oprah Winfrey
column8: "I really believe that if you practice enough you could paint the ‘Mona Lisa' with a two-inch brush." - Bob Ross
column9: "Look around. Look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere - you only have to look to see it." - Bob Ross
column10:
"Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart."
- Roy T. Bennett
column11: Mistakes and setbacks are stepping stones to my success because I learn from them.
column12: I am far more powerful and contain more potential than any circumstance, situation or condition.
column13: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Coco Chanel
column14: "Your story is what you have, what you will always have. It is something to own" - Michelle Obama
column15: "We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own 'to do' list" - Michelle Obama
column16: "I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination." - Jimmy Dean
column17: "If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely," - Roald Dahl
column18: I accept my emotions and let them serve their purpose.
column19: I make a difference in the world by simply existing in it.
column20: Limit your "always" and your "nevers." - Amy Poehler​​
column21: "The most wasted of days is one without laughter." - E. E. Cummings

column1: "Your perspective is unique. It's important and it counts." - Glenn Close
column2: "If you really think small, your world will be small. If you think big, your world will be big." - Paulo Coelho
column3: "I'm better than I used to be. Better than I was yesterday. But hopefully not as good as I'll be tomorrow." - Marianne Williamson
column4:
"Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you're willing to practice, you can do."
- Bob Ross
column5: "The past does not equal the future unless you live there." - Tony Robbins
column6: "Hold up your head! You were not made for failure, you were made for victory." - Anne Gilchrist
column7: "You can do anything here - the only prerequisite is that it makes you happy." - Bob Ross
column8: You are the architect of your life; You build its foundation and choose its contents.
column9: I am choosing and not waiting to be chosen.
column10: "It's so important to do something every day that will make you happy." - Bob Ross
column11: I believe in the person I am becoming.
column12: I observe my thoughts and actions without judging them.
column13: "Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you." - Grace Coddington
column14: "There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way." - Thich Nhat Hanh
column15: "The grass is greener where you water it." - Neil Barringham
column16: "You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them." - Shonda Rhimes
column17: "Good riddance to decisions that don't support self-care, self-value, and self-worth." - Oprah Winfrey
column18: "When we speak we are afraid our words will not be heard or welcomed. But when we are silent, we are still afraid. So it is better to speak." - Audre Lorde
column19: "Don't look at your feet to see if you are doing it right. Just dance." - Anne Lamott
column20: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." - Albert Einstein
column21: I get me, no one else has to.
column22: The more I give, the more I will recieve.
column23: My needs and wants are important.

column1: "Who you are inside is what helps you make and do everything in life." - Mister Rogers
column2: "Your life is about to be incredible." - Tim Storey
column3: "Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'" - Audrey Hepburn
column4: "Every day above earth is a good day." - Ernest Hemingway
column5: "Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
column6: "Go out on a limb - that's where the fruit is." - Bob Ross
column7: I will not compare myself to strangers on the Internet.
column9: "Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create."
column10: I have the power to create change.
column11: "Never think about the mistakes you made. Think about the mistakes you will make." - Bob Ross
column12: I choose to be proud of myself.
column13: If the plan doesn't work, change the plan, but never the goal.
column14: "Don't ever make decisions based on fear. Make decisions based on hope and possibility. Make decisions based on what should happen, not what shouldn't" - Michelle Obama
column15: Avoiding failure is to avoid progress.
column16: "You can never leave footprints that last if you are always walking on tiptoe." - Leymah Gbowee
column17: "When I'm hungry, I eat. When I'm thirsty, I drink. When I feel like saying something, I say it." - Madonna
column18: "You can't be that kid standing at the top of the waterslide, overthinking it. You have to go down the chute." - Tina Fey
column19: I am choosing and not waiting to be chosen.
column20: "Try to be a rainbow in someone else's cloud." - Maya Angelou
column21: "Never limit yourself because of others' limited imagination; never limit others because of your own limited imagination." - Mae Jemison

column1: "Your life is already a miracle of chance waiting for you to shape its destiny." - Toni Morrison
column2: "Gratitude is a celebration we are all invited to." - Cleo Wade
column3:
"There's nothing wrong with having a tree as a friend."
- Bob Ross
column4: "The perfect moment is this one." - Jon Kabat-Zinn
column5: "Your crown has been bought and paid for. Put it on your head and wear it." - Maya Angelou
column6: "Don't forget to tell these special people in your life just how special they are to you." - Bob Ross
column7: "Anytime you learn, you gain." - Bob Ross
column8: "It's hard to see things when you are too close. Take a step back and look." - Bob Ross
column9: "It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform."
column10: By allowing myself to be happy, I inspire others to be happy as well.
column11: "Creativity is intelligence having fun." - Albert Einstein
column12: "Many receive advice, only the wise profit from it." - Harper Lee
column13: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill
column14: "You are the one that possesses the keys to your being. You carry the passport to your own happiness." - Diane von Furstenberg
column15: "I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to dance better than myself." - Arianna Huffington
column16: I put my energy into things that matter to me.
column17: I trust myself to make the right decision.
column18: "When you're through changing, you're through." - Martha Stewart
column19: My thoughts are kind to me because I deserve peace
column20: I choose to be proud of myself and the things I choose to do.
